import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, Badge, Spinner, Tooltip, Tabs, PageTransition } from '../../components/ui/index'; import { BeakerIcon, DocumentIcon, ArrowRightIcon, CheckCircleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const AnimationExamples: React.FC = () => { const [showCard, setShowCard] = useState(false); const [transitionType, setTransitionType] = useState<'fade' | 'slide-up' | 'slide-down' | 'scale'>('fade'); const tabItems = [ { id: 'buttons', label: 'Buttons', content: (

Page Transitions

{transitionType.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + transitionType.slice(1)} Transition

This card is being displayed with a {transitionType} transition. Click the buttons above to see different transitions.

Use Cases

Page transitions can be used to improve user experience when:

  • Navigating between routes
  • Showing/hiding content dynamically
  • Loading new content after API calls
  • Switching between tabs or panels
